sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import ItemStyles from './styles/itemStyles' import Moment from 'moment' class Card extends React.Component { constructor (props) { super (props); } render () { return ( this.props.CharacterData.map(char => (

{char.name}

ID: {char.id} - Created: {Moment(char.created).fromNow()}
  • Status: {char.status}
  • Species: {char.species}
  • Gender: {char.gender}
  • Origin: {char.origin.name}
)) ) } } export default Card;
